verbose_text: This was demonstrated by the overexpression of cardiac specific peroxisome proliferator activated receptor alpha (PPARalpha) that induced increased cardiac lipid oxidation and deranged metabolism and subsequently led to both structural and functional alterations detrimental to the heart [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor alpha (PPARalpha) that induced increased cardiac lipid oxidation and deranged metabolism
